scripts.build-web: yarn build-deps && parcel build --public-url ${URL:-/} --no-source-maps --out-dir dist --out-file index.html src/App.html
scripts.build-abi: yarn contract-wrap && node -e 'console.log(`export default ${JSON.stringify(require("./build/App.abi").abi)} as const`)' > build/App.abi.ts
scripts.contract-wrap: yarn contract-compile && everdev js wrap --export commonjs-default --output App.abi.js build/App
scripts.gh-pages: URL=/$npm_package_name/ yarn build && gh-pages --repo $(git remote --verbose | grep push | cut -f2 | cut -d' ' -f1) --dist dist
